event_registry_properties.item: Please consult the detail section of the knowledge article for additional information.
event_registry_properties.name: description
event_registry_properties.item: Unexpected trap with some unknown cause was detected during POST.
event_registry_properties.name: details
event_registry_properties.item:
Unexpected trap with some unknown cause was detected during POST.
The domain is reset, but nothing is deconfigured.
The system administrator should:
Examine output displayed to the XSCF console and XSCF logs files to identify if a fault had occurred;
XSCF> fmdump -m XSCF> fmdump -v
If the problem persists, proceed with the steps outlined below.
Step 1. Collect the fault message (use one of the following methods):
Single-line fault message displayed on the XSCF console:
Dec 12 12:27:19 san-ff2-16-0 fmd: SOURCE: sde, REV: 1.15, CSN: BE80601000 EVENT-ID: ac36fd90-cccc-4288-b253-e1087f35b3fb Refer to http://www.sun.com/msg/SCF-8008-27 for detailed information.
Complete fault message using 'fmdump -m' on the XSCF console:
MSG-ID: SCF-8008-27, TYPE: upset, VER: 1, SEVERITY: Critical EVENT-TIME: Wed Dec 12 12:27:19 PST 2007 PLATFORM: SPARC Enterprise M5000, CSN: BE80601000, HOSTNAME: san-ff2-16-0 SOURCE: sde, REV: 1.15 EVENT-ID: ac36fd90-cccc-4288-b253-e1087f35b3fb DESC: Unexpected trap with some unknown cause was detected during POST. Refer to http://www.sun.com/msg/SCF-8008-27 for more information. AUTO-RESPONSE: Nothing is deconfigured. IMPACT: The domain is reset. REC-ACTION: Please consult the detail section of the knowledge article for additional information.
Step 2. Collect the output from the 'fmdump -v -u EVENT_ID' command
SPARC Enterprise platform example:
xscf> fmdump -v -u ac36fd90-cccc-4288-b253-e1087f35b3fb
TIME UUID MSG-ID Dec 12 12:27:19.7352 ac36fd90-cccc-4288-b253-e1087f35b3fb SCF-8008-27 100% upset.chassis.domain.fe-unexpected-trap
Problem in: hc:///chassis=0 Affects: - FRU: hc://:product-id=SPARC Enterprise M5000:chassis-id=BE80601000: server-id=san-ff2-16-0/component=CHASSIS Location: CHASSIS
Step 3. Contact your Authorized Service Provider.
event_registry_properties.name: impact
response

event_registry_properties.item: Unexpected trap with some unknown cause was detected during POST.
